original_text: Then they willingly received him into the ship: and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went.
korean_text: 이에 기뻐서 배로 영접하니 배는 곧 그들이 가려던 땅에 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: Then they willingly received him into the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 기꺼이 그를 배에 받아들였다

sentences.original_text: and immediately the ship was at the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 즉시 배는 그 땅에 도착했다
